actions.text: On agreeing to the Higgins (LA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Higgins (LA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Higgins (LA) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to require the Administrator of the FAA to initiate a pilot program to permit the operator of a State 2 airplane to operate that airplane in non-revenue service into medium hub airports or non-hub airports if certain parameters are met.
purpose: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to require the Administrator of the FAA to initiate a pilot program to permit the operator of a State 2 airplane to operate that airplane in non-revenue service into medium hub airports or non-hub airports if certain parameters are met.
